twojplugin.name: 2J Tabs
twojplugin.description: 2J Tabs - it's a fresh breath for your website layout. Very easy and comfortable way to organize your front end content most effective way. 2J Tabs can emulate multi-pages structure based on the Joomla!Â® content articles as result your visitors will get easy access to the big content articles (no need to scroll through a large page). 2JTabs it's multi theme tabs with advanced admin settings and highly customizible CSS3 front end.
twojplugin.description_small: 2J Tabs with multi-themes with advanced admin settings and highly customizable CSS3 front end
